Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Lake Shore Drive/Recreational Drive
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted and Irving Park due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Recreational Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted and Irving Park due to, street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Recreational Drive.

Allow extra travel time.
